MoonClerk is an easy-to-use payment form: MoonClerk es un constructor de forma de pago fácil de usar para Stripe.
Your Moonclerk API Key. You can find it: Tu clave API de Moonclerk. Puedes encontrarla en la configuración de tu cuenta de Moonclerk (https://app.moonclerk.com/settings/api-key)
Retrieve a customer plan from MoonClerk: Recuperar un plan de cliente de MoonClerk usando el ID de cliente
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Hacer una llamada API personalizada a un extremo específico
No Error on Failure: No hay ningún error en fallo
The ID of the customer to retrieve the p: El ID del cliente para recuperar el plan para
Authorization headers are injected autom: Las cabeceras de autorización se inyectan automáticamente desde tu conexión.
Activar para archivos como PDFs, imágenes, etc.
HEAD: LIMPIO
Triggers when a payment is created in an: Dispara cuando un pago se crea en cualquier estado (fallido, exitoso, etc).
Triggers when a new plan is created in M: Se activa cuando se crea un nuevo plan en MoonClerk
Triggers when a plan is canceled or when: Dispara cuando un plan es cancelado o cuando se han agotado los períodos de tiempo establecidos.
Triggers when a payment related to a pla: Dispara cuando un pago relacionado con un plan ha fallado.
## MoonClerk Webhook Setup\n:
## MoonClerk Webhook Setup
                To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your MoonClerk account:
    
                1. Login to your MoonClerk account.
                2. Navigate to **Account** -> **Settings** -> **Webhooks**.
                3. **Create webhook Endpoint**. keep state as active.
                4. Specify the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
                ```text
                {{webhookUrl}}
                ```
                5. Select the **Payment Created** event.
                5. Click Save Agent.

## MoonClerk Webhook Setup
                        To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your MoonClerk account:
            
                        1. Login to your MoonClerk account.
                        2. Navigate to **Account** -> **Settings** -> **Webhooks**.
                        3. **Create webhook Endpoint**. keep state as active.
                        4. Specify the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
                        ```text
                        {{webhookUrl}}
                        ```
                        5. Select the **Plan Created** event.
                        5. Click Save Agent.

## MoonClerk Webhook Setup
                                    To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a webhook in your MoonClerk account:
                        
                                    1. Login to your MoonClerk account.
                                    2. Navigate to **Account** -> **Settings** -> **Webhooks**.
                                    3. **Create webhook Endpoint**. keep state as active.
                                    4. Specify the following URL in the **Webhook URL** field:
                                    ```text
                                    {{webhookUrl}}
                                    ```
                                    5. Select the **Plan Payment Failed** event.
                                    5. Click Save Agent.
